casebody.data:
Monday, October 5,1998

MOTION DOCKET

97-2342. Wightman v. Consol. Rail Corp.

Erie App. No. E-97-001. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal and cross-appeal from *1444the Court of Appeals for Erie County. Upon consideration of the motion of appellee/cross-appellant, Consolidated Rail Corporation, to reschedule oral argument currently scheduled for November 10, 1998, ■

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to reschedule oral argument be, and hereby is, denied.
